title: Boston Celtics guard Malcolm Brogdon
description:
Boston Celtics guard Malcolm Brogdon joins The Woj Pod to discuss his deal to the Eastern Conference champions, life on the trade block, what players value in an NBA coach, and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
